job.title: Research or Sr. Research Scientist, Bioprocess
job.description: <br><strong>Your challenges<br><br></strong><ul><li>Develop and execute experiments to validate, support and promote current products and new product development in bioprocess. </li><li>Present and analyze data in a clear, concise format and write drafts of application notes.</li><li>Provide training to Eppendorf employees and customers.</li><li>Work closely with others in the Bioprocess Business Unit to provide technical input.</li><li>Produce research reports, protocols, and application notes for internal and external publications.</li><li>Evaluate new technologies or products for potential integration into bioprocess product portfolio.</li><li>Evaluate novel and competitive cell culture and fermentation techniques and equipment findings.</li></ul> <br><strong>Your expertise<br><br></strong><ul><li>Ph.D. degree in Biology, Biochemistry, Bioprocess, Bioengineering or other related life science advanced degrees required.</li><li>2-6 years of experiences in mammalian cell culture and bacteria fermentation.</li><li>2-6 years of hands-on experiences working with bioreactors/fermentors in R&amp;D, PD, Applications lab or Bio pharmaceutical settings required. </li><li>Software programming experiences in Visual Basic required. Bioprocess engineering, bioreactor design and scale-up experiences desired</li></ul> <br><strong>Your benefits at Eppendorf<br><br></strong><ul><li>Competitive total rewards package including health, financial, and education benefits</li><li>Innovative and Collaborative company culture</li><li>Work in state of the art laboratory</li><li>Contribute to the improvement of the human living condition<br><br></li></ul><strong>Please note that we can only consider applications that are submitted online via our application management tool.<br></strong>
